titleStmt.title: Something in answer to a letter (which I have seen) of John Leverat, governour of Boston, to William Coddington, governour of Rhode-Island, dated 1677 wherein he mentions my name and also wherein John Leverat justifies Roger Williams's book of lyes.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
